website_summaries.verdict: A highly-rated down jacket recognized for its attractive slim-fit design and faux fur hood.
pros: Faux fur trim around hood is removable
Extremely warm for the cheaper price tag
cons: Some buyers wish it were thicker

customer_reviews.title: Kept me dry for sure but I had to wear like 3 layers underneath
customer_reviews.text: Used it at Lake Tahoe. The temperature was about 20 F. Kept me dry for sure but I had to wear like 3 layers underneath. I have to admit I'm not used to cold weather at all. I bought an L even though I use M. It was loose enough to wear some light sweaters underneath. It shapes the body beautifully! That's probably my favorite part. Would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: karla anaya

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, warm jacket AND cute!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on a Lightning Deal for around $60, and I cannot believe the quality! Super warm (I tested it this morning in 20 degree 20 mph wind and snowing in Michigan), and flattering fit. Zipper seems very substantial and strong, hood is good size and the fur is not cheap looking at all. Nice stretchy ribbed fabric at wrists help seal out the cold, too. Great winter coat especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Armbrustmacher

customer_reviews.title: The description is exact.
customer_reviews.text: I love the coat and so far it’s a perfect fit. I’ll revise this review after I return from Chicago to be more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Tanoli

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money, and extremely good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the warmest and light weight coats I have ever owned. Was out in 10 degree weather the other night and I was very warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: This was disgusting. Unfortunately I have no time to return it ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my jacket....it was used by a very cheeky person. Reeked of perfume and perspiration with straggly matted faux fur. I know this is not usual since the one I ordered first but had to return because it didn't fit was lovely. This was disgusting. Unfortunately I have no time to return it and get a replacement before going on our winter vacation. I almost never post reviews but this was horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Wikedat

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Warm and waterproof. Wore during a bitterly cold wind in NYC recently. Wear a hat under the hood as it isn't a close fit but other than that - awesome, close fitting and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Taggart

customer_reviews.title: Bad fur and smelly
customer_reviews.text: The fur looks like a dead rat and it smells like a dead duck. I listen to another review to get a similar style in competitor company (starts with V) and the other jacket is SO MUCH better. This one does not have inner pocket and buttons are plastic instead of metal. I am 5'3" and 127Ib...normal a size 2-4P and a S fits loose. I return this and keeping the competitor jacket.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it. Came with a huge hole ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. Came with a huge hole in the left pocket. I covet my pockets and besides, what sensible Midwestern girl would have a hole in her pocket? Where would you put your gloves and car keys? Back it went.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet and Sour

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good coat. The zipper isn't smooth. One pocket lining was not sewn. It had a huge hole in it. The down settled to the bottom of the coat. I will be sure it back.I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for price
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is awesome. It is lighter weight, but I like that. The hood is nice and deep- I can have a pony tail and it doesn’t fall down. The pockets are also nice and deep. I wish it had fleece lining just inside for added comfort/warmth, but it is still very nice. The material and quality does seem a little delicate so I think it’s not made to last for years and years unless you are gentle and take good care of your clothes. Overall, great jacket. Very cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and cozy - great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, really cute and seems warm! I’m 5’6” and 125 lbs. The S fits perfectly. It’s flattering, but has room for a sweater underneath. For the $$ I think it’s a great deal. Only odd feature is the fur trim that’s attached with buttons. Hopefully it doesn’t come detached easily or I’ll have to sew it on by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a trip to Chicago in December/ perfect for cold weather and like the longness about it/ ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a trip to Chicago in December/ perfect for cold weather and like the longness about it/ kept legs warm too/ fit perfect with I felt like a slimming look/ 5 ' 8" and 195# and bought the xlg . Deep front pockets/
customer_reviews.author: Pmt

customer_reviews.title: I can wear a shirt and a hoodie underneath and the coat still fits fine. The zipper works fine and I was glad ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" 130lb and I got the large. I can wear a shirt and a hoodie underneath and the coat still fits fine. The zipper works fine and I was glad to see the furry thing on the hood was easy to remove. I'm giving 4 stars because the pockets are very tight and it's 's not comfortable putting my gloves in there. The coat is puffy and so when I sit, there is a moment were the coat deflates a bit which I find amusing. I've worn this a few times outside in 20F weather and it keeps me from getting too cold.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Great coat, very warm
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'4" and 125 lbs, I ordered the small and it fits great! It hits right about mid thigh so it's perfect to wear with longer tops and sweaters that would otherwise look weird sticking out from the bottom of a shorter coat. This coat is also super warm, I live in upstate NY and it's been in the teens and single digits here and this coat does the job! I love that the faux fur is detachable too. The double ended zipper takes some getting used too, but I like that I can zip it up from the bottom when I'm driving so my legs don't feel restricted. I would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Little fit

customer_reviews.title: Broken Zipper & Fur Falls Off Hood
customer_reviews.text: The double zipper clasp to insert a single zipper is ineffective. I made it through a month of winter when the bottom clasp fell off my jacket. With my trouble it was able to be put back on, but continued to have trouble zipping. The zipper would act like it worked and then separated as you pulled it up. It’s disappointing there are no buttons as an alternative. The fur is buttoned on for easy removal. Even if you don’t want to remove it though, it constantly falls off the buttons on it’s own. I was shocked at the quality of this jacket after the many positive reviews it had here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute, Warm.. Already Tearing After Three Months
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this coat since November and wore it often over winter. Pros: Fits well, looks really nice, is warm. Cons: Nearly all of the elastic loops that attach the fur to the hood have torn off, so I've had to safety pin the fur to the jacket. One of the seams on the fur also ripped, and although I assumed the white would get dirty fairly easily, I was surprised by how easily is stains. I'm bummed because this jacket is wicked cute but already falling apart, and I can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CBCB

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: Glad I ordered 1 size up otherwise it would be difficult to zip up wearing a heavy sweater. I was in NYC. It kept me very warm and dry in light rain. Only complaint is hood is too big and falls over your face so you have to hold it back to see. The faux fur does not look like pictured in the add. It’s thinner and looks pretty cheap. Not sure what it will looks like if it gets really wet or washed. Other than that I like the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: Love STYLE and also very comfortable. I love this jacket but you need to watch the weather forecast carefully. I was in New York this past week and it began snowing and raining at the same time. Unfortunately it did not take long for the water to penetrate the jacket. Since the temperature was below freezing I was stuck with a wet coat and wet clothes in below freezing temperatures. I did not think I would ever get warm again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: The pockets have no zipper and the sizing runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the length of the coat and the fact that the pockets supposedly had zippers, they do not. The sizing seems to be off because I ordered the size suggested according to the chart and when I tried this on it was too tight in the upper arms. Another reason for ordering this coat, was that it was down and not big and puffy and the fact that the fur on the hood is removable. But, for almost all of the reasons that I chose to order this coat, I have already ordered another of the same, 1 step larger.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: The coat had a stain on the left arm. The coat also had someone personal hand-drawn map of San Fran and a transfer tickets-planning for a tourist walk. Paid full price for what appeared to be a used jacket.
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this coat! I am 5'7. 195 pds. originally purchased a xlg, too small. reordered a xx large. Fits perfect. I can't wait until its cold so I can wear it!
customer_reviews.author: blondie

customer_reviews.title: I really like the fit of this coat especially after reviewing previous ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fit of this coat especially after reviewing previous customers whose reviews stated that this coat runs small. I am glad I brought a 2X (normally I wear an XL) . Its very warm too. I'm in South Carolina and the coldest days are in the low 30s. The 1 thing I didn't really care for is the zipper quality, other than that it's a very nice coat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: STACY W

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little smaller
customer_reviews.text: I just received this coat last week. I ordered an XL because that is what I usually wear. I guess I did not take into account that this coat is somewhat fitted so it runs a little smaller. My main issue was that it feels a little snug in the shoulder area when I try to move my arms. I'm still wearing it but I can't put anything too thick or heavy underneath it, so I went ahead and ordered one size up and will probably end up giving this one to my sister or donating it. It's a great coat though. Nice and warm and the fur is removable. Obviously I would def repurchase as I already did lol
customer_reviews.author: Jscott

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is defective
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on this is defective. Impossible to zip up. I bought this for my 58 year-old mother, she was not able to zip it up. Nor was I.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Satin Sheen Army Colored Down Coat
customer_reviews.text: I love what I received. I researched other customers' comments to ensure this was the coat I wanted. I am 5'5" and weight is 188 lbs. I order the XL and it fits perfect. I loved the satin sheen Army green color. Just what I have been looking for. A very top of the line coat. And, the faux fur around the hood was nice and full and thick. It is a full down coat with ribbed cuffs to keep the cold air out. Thank you Amazon. You pulled this one through again.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria French

customer_reviews.title: Great coat. Warm and dry. Need to attach fur better!
customer_reviews.text: The coat stayed dry and was warm. It was very snug around my thighs so it was hard take big steps to climb or squat down. Sometimes the zipper would open at the bottom. Worse thing about it which is an easy fix if the it fits well is that the fur since it’s detachable is only tacked down in a couple of places and it flies off with the wind not looking good. So if you like the fur, Add a few snaps or stitches and everything else with the coat is great.
customer_reviews.author: chronic shopper

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but wonderful jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this jacket! It was perfect and was exactly what I was looking for! However, it was too small. I normally wear and XL, so I choose 2XL in jackets to allow for sweaters, etc. This size 2XL jacket fit like a glove, with no room to spare. So, I sent it back reluctantly, as I loved it, but it was just too small!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing jacket, warm, and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Such a CUTE AND WARM jacket!! I ordered a size up as i read it Fits small- that was a great call. Sleek, So warm- doesn’t feel heavy- great for traveling too because it compresses down into the size of the hood- the hood has good coverage and is big. The fur is so cute! While on my trip to New York i noticed the fur didn’t stay on because the fur strip was missing loops- i contacted the seller and they sent a new fur strip when i got home. The replacement was perfect and their communication was great! I plan to buy this jacket for my daughter for our trip back east as soon as i can.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Ax

customer_reviews.title: Decent warm coat
customer_reviews.text: I needed a winter jacket that wasn't too expensive. This fits the bill. It's extremely warm (I usually can't wear it once the weather is above 40F), I like the color (ordered the Olive), and it isn't too bulky. I'm not a fan of the faux fur, but thankfully that's removable. Only two complaints -- when the coat gets wet in the rain or snow, it looks splotchy until it dries. The button holding the hood keeps snagging and pulling on my hair. Otherwise, this was a nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: rvny2000

customer_reviews.title: This coat is a nice style, but on the thin side
customer_reviews.text: This coat is a nice style, but on the thin side. It looks good and it will keep you warm. Still, I had my doubts and bought a better quality coat for really cold days that I'm very happy with:
customer_reviews.author: BraceyFamily

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coat for a business trip to Chicago last weekend during the polar vortex. The coat is very light and I was able to pack it on the outside pocket of my suitcase until I needed it. It's perfectly warm, the temps in Chicago dropped to -11 degrees, I was out in the wind and cold and felt really comfortable. I'm not a huge fan of the fur, it looks cheap, but you can take it off. It may need some fluffing to make is not look completely smashed. I also wish it had inside pockets, but what is does have are plenty deep and are sufficient. Highly recommend the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Renée

customer_reviews.title: Warm, wish it were a bit more fitted
customer_reviews.text: I think I’ll keep this because I needed a very warm jacket and warm it is. I’m knocking off one star because the faux fur seems cheap for the price of the item, but above all because it frustrates me very much how often coats are pictured in a way that makes it look like they will shape the waistline and then instead you always end up with a straight sack. This might be the reason why I could ultimately return the jacket. I’m not sure yet. Otherwise, quality and fit pretty much as expected. Best feature: warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: SHE LOVES THE COAT
customer_reviews.text: Well I got 2 coats for my lady friend she absolutely love the coats but she couldn't zip it, she's top heavy lol!! They just came this morning so I'm about to order her 2 more but 2X this time, 2X should be prefect for her. I don't know how to return items so I'll just buy two more, she's 5'4 weight 178 pounds so ladies if you're top heavy like her I think it's best to go a bigger size. But she loves the coats, about to order two more now express
customer_reviews.author: Tp

customer_reviews.title: Love this coat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coat for Texas weather! It’s a bit light so if I were traveling to Colorado in winter, I’d leave this one home. The fit is not too tight for me, but it is a bit snug. My arms are short and it fits perfectly to my wrist. If I were to wear something chunky or bulky underneath, I’d probably be a little uncomfortable. Olive color is great! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Texas, USA

customer_reviews.title: It's a little offseason at this time and we couldn't find anything in our local stores that she liked at a price you could afford
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this parka as a gift for my sister-in-law. It's a little offseason at this time and we couldn't find anything in our local stores that she liked at a price you could afford. Looking online I found this jacket that has excellent ratings and I am certainly not disappointed in the product. It fits her perfectly and looks great on her. It seems like an excellent product and I would certainly buy something from this company again. We got an extra large which fits her 5ft 6 inch foot frame well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality jacket but runs big
customer_reviews.text: I’m typically a size small in things and even with a sweater on I feel the small is still too roomy. I read reviews and people said fits too small or tts so I got the small thinking it would be fine but it has generous room for a small. I do like the jacket overall and the quality is nice. It keeps me warm, the pockets are nice and deep and the hood is too.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket and I like the length
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a surprise trip to Big Bear, California right after a snowstorm. It kept me warm and fit nicely. People complain that the buttons are plastic and that the zipper doesn’t work right. I found that my buttons were metal not plastic and if you pull both of the zipper pulls down to the bottom and match them up, it will zip up nicely. The fur collar was icky and looked like road kill, so I removed it. For the record I am 140 pounds and 5’2” and I got the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Trackee

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm at 10 degrees.
customer_reviews.text: The coat is fabulous and very comfortable and the slight tailoring and embellishments really complimented me. It was about 10 degrees, so I wore fleece underlayers, but was not overwhelmed and had plenty of movement while staying warm. Runs small if you want layers underneath. I had to order a xxl. I wear an xl. I removed the fake fur. It is really fake looking and ugly. The coat looks a lot better without it.
customer_reviews.author: placerville

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my daughter because she wanted a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter because she wanted a warmer "light weight" coat. It is very light and she said it is warmer than her Patagonia fleece.
customer_reviews.author: W. J.

customer_reviews.title: Best Coat Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous coat. I ordered the green because the only other color left was black. It is a beautiful, almost irridescent color with lovely details- like buttons on th pockets and the sides. The hood fits perfectly - usually they are way too big. It is very warm, the sleeves have the extra cuff to keep out the cold wind, and it has the double zipper that opens from the bottom up as well as the top. One of the best coats I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma in Grand Rapids

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coat after living in Arizona and moving to a cold climate and have been thrilled with every aspect of it. The zipper is nice and big so you can easily zip it - plus it's a double zip so you can easily unzip the bottom when you sit down, a nice feature. The down is super warm, there are cuffs in the sleeves so no drafts and finally - BIG pockets that don't bag out or change the overall look of the coat. Add the fun (fake) fur and this jacket was a great purchase. It has a feminine cut to it as well - bonus in a down jacket!
customer_reviews.author: ema

customer_reviews.title: Ugly in person
customer_reviews.text: The coat was cute but cheap feeling and the fur on hood was hideous looking. Very much a swing and a miss.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Booth

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my new jacket. I only had it for a couple of weeks. It is really warm, I don't need to wear many layers if I have this jacket. I like the big pockets where I can fit many things. The zipper is somehow troublesome, I hope to find the trick soon. The fake fur sheds a little.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiana Cesa

customer_reviews.title: Great coat, lose the fur
customer_reviews.text: I really like this coat, only a couple of issues which is why I have given 4 stars. It says hood is removable, which was big selling point for me. Hood does not come off, only the fur detached which saved me from having to send coat back, the fur, in my opinion was ugly. Like having an orangatang around your neck. The coat itself, is light and fluffy, appears well made and does flatter the figure. Looks fine without any fur.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Burley

customer_reviews.title: Warm, beautiful and plenty of room for scarf and sweater.
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat!! I left the first one in my car and it turned colors. I was bummed!! But I found it here on Amazon, and couldn't wait to try it on. Perfect!! This coat is warm, I am small. 5'0 110 lbs. So it's long on me to my knees, which I like. Buy this coat!! Worth the money! But, be careful. Stains will never come out.
customer_reviews.author: Mindysue

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated with this coat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coat back in January. When it arrived I loved the look. I did notice where the zipper would come undone at the bottom and start to open up at times. Now that I am wearing it again due to declining temperatures it has progressively gotten worse. The coat wont stay zipped. It continues to open from the bottom and now in the middle as well. I have not gotten a full winter season out of this coat and I can already no longer wear it due to the malfunction. The coat looks great but the zipper quality is horrible. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and great fit
customer_reviews.text: This coat is perfect for cold weather! I’m short at 5foot and felt this fit perfect. The sleeves have a tight fit around the wrist which helps with sleeve length if your arms are short like mine. I loved that the hood is removable and don’t be discouraged if the fur is flat upon arrival, I brushed it like dog hair and it fluffed right up! Great quality, So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Artic Coat!
customer_reviews.text: This coat looks well made, lightweight, and warm even though not Ohio Winter tested yet. I bought a L even though I normally would do a M (145lb and size 4 or 6) as I want to be able to wear my sweater layers underneath. I also ordered a replacement fur hood lining as I want a huge one, love that fluffy look. Good buy overall!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket-purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’9” and large chested, bought an XL and am able to zip up even with a thick sweater underneath. I love that you can remove the hoodie if needed and since this jacket is waterproof, it’s very functional. Bought it for a trip to Europe and it was perfect, easy to pack because it rolls up in a small ball yet super warm and overall cute! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Pack

customer_reviews.title: Very warm, a little big, but great for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the coat in a medium because I wanted to be able to wear layers beneath. I received it and it was pretty large on me. It almost covered my hands and was loose. I returned it with no issues and ordered a small. It fits much better and still has room underneath for layers. I like the color (black), hood, and thickness. I don't love the large plastic buttons, especially the ones at the bottom of the coat on the sides that don't seem to have any purpose.
customer_reviews.author: blue12rain

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you nice and warm.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this coat. Has kept me toasty warm. And, I get a lot of compliments on the style. My only negative remark would be the fur collar. It looked scraggly and cheap. So, I took it off and haven’t missed it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M. Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: I live in South Korea and..
customer_reviews.text: this jacket keeps me warm! That's truly a feat here during the winter! It's cute, I love jackets with two zippers, very versatile, and not impeding of movement. Of course, it's white, so it must be washed often, but it does remain true to colour and dries fast. I don't like that the fur hood trim buttons come off fairly often.
customer_reviews.author: Olabamipe Fashola

customer_reviews.title: Cool green coat.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the coat looks. I'm 5'8 130lbs. I first ordered the Medium but it was way to big. I then got the small and it fits great and the sleeves ARE long enough! I was worried it would be to short. The weight of the coat seems good for Northeast Winters.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: but faulty zipper and poor quality made this jacket not worth the cost or ...
customer_reviews.text: Darling design, but faulty zipper and poor quality made this jacket not worth the cost or worth keeping.
customer_reviews.author: belinda hilderbrand

customer_reviews.title: I bought the first one for myself last season because it looked nice in the picture and was a really good price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time purchasing this jacket. I bought the first one for myself last season because it looked nice in the picture and was a really good price. It arrived quickly, looked and fit great and was very warm. I loved it so much that I bought my daughter the same jacket this year. The price for my daughter's jacket was about $20 more than what I paid last year, but even at the higher price, it is still a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty coat
customer_reviews.text: Just received my coat and I'm so excited. I got it in white. I love the shape and length of it and while I am.a large I am very glad I bought an extra large!!probably could have gone a size up even. The only thing is that it's really thin and I'm wondering if it's really going to be enough for those long NY / NJ winters but as all the reviews stated it was really warm I hope it will. One star of for the zipper made out of cheap plastic but overall very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: mfrance74

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to be warm
customer_reviews.text: The wife likes it. I love it. Its extremely warm. She is 5ft 2in and weighs about 130lbs. I originally ordered a Medium after reading peoples reviews and Q&A. But she wasn't happy with the Medium . too wide around the back. Returned and reordered a small, she is happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rippy

customer_reviews.title: it's not super warm. while it is cute and would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this coat in hopes I could take it to Iceland but unfortunatley, it's not super warm. while it is cute and would be good for weather 30 degrees and up, unfortunately it didn't work for my trip. I followed the size chart and opted for a size up given I'd have to layer and the measurements looked just right without layering, however, the size is a bit large and I looked like I was swimming in it a bit. Think the measurements are probably fairly true to size but if you are on the cusp of a size, opt for the smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia G

customer_reviews.title: As picture shows
customer_reviews.text: Looks as picture shows.. looks better with fur on than off, but it's cool that you can remove the fur. Havent worn it yet because it's July.. I'll be wearing it on my Alaska trip in 27 days!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Swimmy

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and warm winter jacket which has become the favored ...
customer_reviews.text: The Orolay Women's Down Jacket with Faux Fir Trim is a well made, sturdy and warm winter jacket which has become the favored jacket in my closet. It has a waterproof tough exterior and a silky lined interior. It is also windproof and not a heavy winter coat which is great for movement while wearing it. I would recommend it for traveling or just everyday wear in cold climates. The hood is very chic and warm and lovely even when down. It's parka style is a wonderful fashion piece. The Faux Fur trim is very soft and feather like. A beautiful jacket by any standards.
customer_reviews.author: Reesa

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm!
customer_reviews.text: This coat is fashionable and feels light weight not too bulky but when you are out in the cold it keeps you nice an warm. The wind does not blow through it . Fits true to size .
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but not the right fit
customer_reviews.text: For the price, its a decent jacket. Im 5'4 and 135lbs, bought a medium and it was too big. If I was happy with the style and quality, I would have exchanged it for a small. Unfortunately, when I tried it on there was a hole in the seam of the arm at the shoulder, so I decided to go with a different jacket all together. Super cute and affordable, if you can get the right fit!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Teich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length.......
customer_reviews.text: The length is just right not too long but covers your butt, just what I was looking for. The sleeves are great because the cuffs will stay down and no cold air can get in either. It’s nice and soft but is warm. Last but not least the hood is amazing !!
customer_reviews.author: jill desranleau

customer_reviews.title: Feminine fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the fit. Feminine fit and longer to cover your assets. I haven't worn it in cold or rainy weather. So not sure how it will hold up. I like that you can remove the fur. I'm 5'5 and 160lbs. The L fit good. Not too tight or loose.
customer_reviews.author: nmendoza94

customer_reviews.title: Warm and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat. I bought it just as a warm winter coat but I went hunting in it this weekend. Weather windy with temps in the mid teens. Was really warm with base layers. Didn't feel the wind at all. The coat does run a bit small. If you are full figure go up a size. I'm 5'3", 150 and went with the large. The S shape make you still look like you have a figure. The zipper sticks a little be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: it's very stylish and I like that it unzips from the bottom so it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked in many stores for more than a couple of weeks for just the right jacket, but found this one on Amazon when I had all but given up the hunt. This jacket is light weight yet very warm. The fur collar comes off, it's very stylish and I like that it unzips from the bottom so it doesn't bunch up when you sit in the car. Very nice jacket. You won't be disappointed. My only complaint is it doesn't come in Navy; otherwise I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size and color as expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm happy with the coat. I purchased a size bigger than I would wear without layering. I wanted to be able to layer, as we have had bitterly cold winter thus far. I have worn it once without layering and my chest area felt cool as air came in through the zipper. I do wish the pockets were slightly deeper but I can keep gloves in them safely. The size and color was as expected. I think it is well made for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona E Warner

customer_reviews.title: Not warm enough for sub zero Minnesota winters....
customer_reviews.text: Cute enough, awesome price, fit well, I didn't mind the fur around the hood, my only problem is that all the reviews I read said how warm it was however after 10 minutes outside with the dog I was freezing and when I came in my sweat shirt sleeves were actually cold to touch. It is way to thin to be warm, that is way I returned mine, and will continue to look.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Great Coat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat ! It's cute and warm. It's as close to white as it gets - just a little "off white" That's why it looks white in the picture. I've seen people say it runs big and others say it runs small. I found it to be perfectly true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket... 4 stars inasmuch as I purchased based on former reviews referencing 'finger holes', which I love. Unfortunately there were none..& the cheesy fur trim can be easily removed! I'm 5'5 & 110.lbs. The Small fits perfectly. I bought the green (unusual for me) but the color is olive and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: estreet111

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coat. Snug through the middle and bottom
customer_reviews.text: I really love this coat. It is soft and cozy. Keeps me very warm. As other reviewers have said, it is very snug through the middle and bottom but doable. I’m 220 pounds, ordered the xxl. I could have used a 3xl but they don’t go up that high. I will keep the xxl. In other brands of coats I wear a 2xl with room.
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: My coat
customer_reviews.text: I was worry it wouldn't fit, just because I'm 5'8 and a little busty... once I tried it on, it was love at first sight.😘 It's a little tight on the arm area, but I still love it. This is my second coat I buy, from Amazon and it has been a great experience. Haven't had a complaint...😊
customer_reviews.author: Ms.W

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and very warm
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is awesome! It’s very well made and very warm. I get compliments on it all the time! I usually wear a small/medium in tops. I’m 5’6” and 135lbs and I ordered a small and it fits very well with sweaters underneath, BUT I also prefer my jackets to be more form fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Kegan

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable coat for the cold!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect coat! It is well made, nice thigh length, very warm, knit cuffs in sleeves, and the hood can be pulled forward over my face or rolled back slightly so I have peripheral vision but still keep warm. I stand outside for bus and recess duty for at least 20 minutes at a time and this is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: ... a whole lot of room to grow but I like The fact that you can unzip it from the ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida so I will not use the jacket until I go to Colorado but trying it on it's very very warm and I wear a size 16 there is not a whole lot of room to grow but I like The fact that you can unzip it from the bottom and still have the top zip to give you some room over all it is a beautiful jacket !
customer_reviews.author: cindy metzger

customer_reviews.title: Cute Jacket
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is cute. I can't say if its warm because I didn't get a chance to wear it. It was too big for me, so unfortunately I had to return it. Im 5' 6" and 133lbs slim and the medium just look square on me. No shape. It wasn't flattering to my figure. The small would've been better. Other than that cute jacket but should've been a little less in price
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: While I love the jacket
customer_reviews.text: While I love the jacket, the buttons on the hoods are very cheaply made and have broken. Had to see back on. Also a rip in the pocket after one use! Coat is rather big as well. Should’ve gotten a small. While it’s warm, and very nice looking, product seems a bit cheaply made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: loved the style and the price
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered the off White prior and realized it was not going to be practical so I returned it and got the green one ...loved the style and the price ! got the green .. love the color, the faux fur hood even better that on the white It s sized well and it’s a pretty jacket!!
customer_reviews.author: C. L

customer_reviews.title: Very comforable jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Nice coat. Love the length, I should have bought a small but went with the medium. Very warm. I would buy the coat again. I am 5ft 3" weight. 135 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Honest B on reviews

customer_reviews.title: Very puffy
customer_reviews.text: Really cute but Puffier than it looked in the picture. I immediately put this coat on when it arrived today. Right out of the box I loved the color and the faux fur is a nice quality. I have gotten used to the coats that you can put into a bag. This one would have taken up a very large space in my suitcase. I think it would be warm, if you don't mind the extra bulk.
customer_reviews.author: gswa

customer_reviews.title: Warm jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very warm and I love the fit. But the fur on the hood is really cheap looking. I almost returned it for that reason, but decided to keep it and remove the fur later if I couldn't stand it anymore! Otherwise, it seems to be pretty good quality. I have no experience with this brand so I'll give it a chance!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Warm & stylish!
customer_reviews.text: This coat kept me warm on a 30 minute trail walk in 5 degree weather with a slight breeze..the hood is excellent because it completely covers your head & face from the elements. Fits great, long enough to keep out wind & keep you toasty, but not over heated. DEFINITELY recommend this coat.
customer_reviews.author: Angela J Krohn

customer_reviews.title: This by far is one of greatest coats I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This by far is one of greatest coats I have ever bought. This coat has every detail for cold weather. It has style but everything you need for Massachusetts crazy weather. I will go out on a limb and recommend very highly for weather protection and even style
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket:)
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this jacket because it is very warm and very comfortable. I bought the x small. I am 5'1 115lbs. And it fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable, and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat! I get compliments on it wherever I go. The nipped waist and curved lines of the quilting take what could be a shapeless mass and turn it into something sleek and flattering. I prefer my puffy garments to not be *too* fitted, though, so I did have to exchange it for a larger size. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Matelli

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT! One day the high was only 16 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for a trip to New Hampshire and waited til I tested it out before writing my review. I LOVE IT! One day the high was only 16 degrees and my upper body was very warm and I only had on a thin sweater underneath. One night the wind was blowing and the jacket really did a great job of blocking it and keeping me warm. Its very stylish, I highly recommend it. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jody F

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is fine. It looks slightly cheap but then again it was only $70! I live in the South so I only need a down coat a couple of times a year when I travel. I don't plan to return it, but it doesn't look quite as luxe as it does in the picture and the zipper is super finicky. This jacket is a bit large on me, I'm about a size 6 and got a Medium.
customer_reviews.author: A. McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and nice looking jacket!
customer_reviews.text: The coat feels very warm, comfy, and the length is ideal. It is also very stylish and light weight! I bought the small first but I returned it coz it feels bigger even with a sweater inside. I got the extra small and it fits perfect. I’m usually extra small but the other reviews said to order half size up which I did initially. I recommend you order your regular size unless you want more room, then order a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: BobotRN

customer_reviews.title: Don't size up.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this coat in a M and ended up returning for a small. No need to size up - if you're between sizes you can feel confident going with the smaller option. I have broad shoulders and the S was snug around the shoulders/arms with thermal and fleece layers underneath - but still loose at the waist (I'm 5ft 5 and about 140 for context). Coat feels surprisingly warm given the light weight. Like the inner elasticated cuffs at wrist. The fur is def faux looking but its a hundred bucks! Manage those expectations folks : ) Nice coat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thismuchistrue

customer_reviews.title: Roomy for sweaters!
customer_reviews.text: It is not too heavy. The length is not too long nor short. Easy to put on, cute pockets with buttons. The fit is so comfortable in shoulders, breast, hips, and easy to zip. Stylish with side buttons. Casual coat that's stylish. You can wear sweaters underneath without it being too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. The pockets are amazing. There is also an inside pocket which I like. The jacket feels warm but it hasn’t been cold enough to wear it yet. I have bought an orolay jacket in the past, the bomber jacket, and it was extremely warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love love the coat! Nice and warm and cozy! Wasn't crazy about the faux fur on the hood. Just be careful if you take off the faux fur on the hood. If you have long hair it gets stuck on the buttons of the hood.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Warm! Minor issues
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED the fur on this, so I bought it. Except the fur was....a bit musty when it came. A little gentle handwash fixed that. The zipper does get caught as other reviewers have mentioned, but beside being afraid to break the zipper by pulling the first few times, it's not too much of a hassle. The real test was the weather, down to 20 degrees F. Everything that wasn't covered by this jacket was freezing. Everything that was covered by this jacket was comfortable. Overall, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Love the coat - except the zipper.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this coat. It's very flattering, extremely warm, and looks good with or without the fur. Unfortunately, the zipper is not high quality, and it broke after just a few days of wear. This happened while I was in Iceland! Really bad timing. It's too late for me to return the coat, so I will probably pay to have the zipper replaced by a tailor.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Keener

customer_reviews.title: Jacket ripped first time worn.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this jacket. The fit was perfect and very flattering. It also appeared to be of good quality and warm, however I was sorely disappointed upon the first time wearing it the pocket ripped wide open. I haven’t had this happen with some of the cheapest jackets I’ve ever bought in my life. Definitely not worth the price. Sadly, I had to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the size is perfect! I was extremely happy about how warm I ...
customer_reviews.text: Due to conflicting reviews, I was worried the coat wouldn't be true to size. I ordered an XL. I'm 5'10", pant size 15-16, with weight evenly distributed. The coat fits very well, and the size is perfect! I was extremely happy about how warm I felt when wearing the coat in 32 degree weather. I'm looking forward to not freezing this winter!! Great coat for an even better price!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great coat!
customer_reviews.text: Im 5'8'' 170 lbs & typically wear a 12-14. I was a little sceptical about the X-large fitting me expecially with a heavy sweater under it, but it fits great plenty of room for what ever you want to wear under it. The buttons dont bother me, but im not to picky. The coat is very comfortable, I do wish it had interior pockets and the hood was detachable. Even with that being said . I love the coat. It looks good. Going to get another for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: awesome

customer_reviews.title: Love the style and color but did have a problem ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and color but did have a problem with size. Ordered a medium and had to return for large, large fits better but not perfect. I am only 5'2" and weigh 130 so really think this coat runs really small!
customer_reviews.author: Earlene

customer_reviews.title: Great well-made super warm jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great jacket! It's well made and super warm! The only thing I didn't like was the faux fur around the hood. It looked a bit better after I brushed it with a metal-tined pet fur brush but I ended up ordering a different faux fur to replace it so now I'm super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Movie-Maven

customer_reviews.title: very flattering and comfortable. Plan on taking it to Germany in January
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, very flattering and comfortable. Plan on taking it to Germany in January. That will be the test to see if it's warm enough. I'll take it to the mountains next month after the first snowfall.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S Proffitt

product_meta.title: Orolay Women's Down Jacket with Faux Fur Trim Hood
feature_bullets: The filling is white duck down with high purity.
The waist-tightening and slim-fitting design hides your proud flesh at your waist and instead forms a curve there.
We used big, good-quality white duck down, which is extraordinary in keeping warm.
The big hood with removable high-quality faux fur trim keep you fashion and warm.
High-density water splash against and windproof material.
